title: Wouter Ryckbosch
text:
Welcome to My Personal Website
Hello, I’m Wouter Ryckbosch, a professor at the Vrije Universiteit Brussel. Welcome to my personal website where you can find information about my research, publications, and more.
Feel free to explore and learn more about my work in the field of Social History of Capitalism and Digital Humanities.

title: About Me
text:
I am Wouter Ryckbosch, a professor at the Vrije Universiteit Brussel. My research focuses on the Social History of Capitalism and Digital Humanities. I have been actively involved in various research projects and have published numerous articles and books in my field.






PhD in History, Vrije Universiteit Brussel
MA in History, Vrije Universiteit Brussel
BA in History, Vrije Universiteit Brussel





Social History of Capitalism
Digital Humanities
Comparative History
Environmental History





Ryckbosch, W. (2023). Energy in the Early Modern Home: Material Cultures of Domestic Energy Consumption in Europe, 1450–1850. Routledge.
Kim, S., Baudru, J., Ryckbosch, W., Bersini, H., & Ginis, V. (2025). Early evidence of how LLMs outperform traditional systems on OCR/HTR tasks for historical records.
Kim, S., Vanhoyweghen, A., Ryckbosch, W., & Ginis, V. (2025). Is Intergenerational Elasticity (IGE) a Misleading Measure of Wealth Mobility?





Email: wouter.ryckbosch@vub.be
Address: Pleinlaan 2, 1050 Brussels, Belgium
